summary: Comprehensive testing of dual parent system (father_id and mother_id) and email notification features completed successfully. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend dual parent selection dropdowns, email fields, and automatic email notifications to all family members are working correctly.
passed_tests: Universal login with credentials (username: onefam, password: Welcome1)
Add member with email field visible and working
Add member with FATHER selection (separate dropdown)
Add member with MOTHER selection (separate dropdown)
Add member with BOTH father and mother selected
Edit member - father and mother fields retain values and are present
Tree view displays correctly with both parent relationships
Alerts panel shows 'Send to All Family Members' section
Send alerts button works and sends to all members with emails
Backend API: POST /api/families/{family_id}/send-alerts sends to all members with emails
Backend API: father_id and mother_id fields work in create member
Backend API: father_id and mother_id fields work in update member
Create multiple members with emails and verify alert sending to all
Dual parent system backend tests (19/19 tests passed)
Email field integration with notifications system
Tree view hierarchy display with dual parent relationships
Cards view showing all family members
Parent selection dropdowns populated with existing family members

success_percentage.backend: 100% (19/19 tests passed including dual parent system)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all dual parent and email features working)
